parameters.name: ActionName
parameters.description: The name of the action in the playbook.

parameters.name: AssetId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource. This parameter is deprecated.

parameters.name: ComponentName
parameters.description: The name of the component in the playbook.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The message body sent by the DingTalk group chatbot webhook.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: MsgType
parameters.description:
The type of the webhook message. Valid values:
*   text.
*   markdown.
*   actionCard.

parameters.name: NodeName
parameters.description: The name of the node in the playbook.

parameters.name: PlaybookUuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the user who switches from the current view to the destination view by using the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:

*   0 (default): the view of the current Alibaba Cloud account.
*   1: the view of all accounts for the enterprise.

parameters.name: Secret
parameters.description: The message key of the DingTalk chatbot webhook. This parameter is deprecated.

parameters.name: Webhook
parameters.description:
The IDs of chatbots that are configured in the message center. Only DingTalk chatbots are supported.

>  You can call the [ListEncryptWebhooks](~~ListEncryptWebhooks~~) operation to query the chatbot IDs.
